transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir, ab aa rahi hai aawaz aapko?
Customer: Ha ye abhi bhi aa raha hai, pehle bhi aaya tha but there is a echo in the background.
Executive: Okay, just give me a second sir, just give me a second.
Executive: Ji sir, ab clear hai? Ab toh nahi aa raha sir thoda sa background se?
Customer: Better.
Executive: Thoda woh ye hai ki ji, ji. Maine basically sir call isliye kiya hai actually aap se mera Friday bhi conversation hua tha apni firm ko leke Urban Clay ko leke jo Kurnool se chal rahi hai. Apni kuch leads vagera aapke paas nahi aa rahi thi aur dusri cheez aapki side se ek mail bhi receive hua hai hume kal.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ki jisme aapne bola ki by-leads vagera mere ko mili hai lekin main use nahi kar pa raha unko, right?
Customer: I'm getting most of the things from Hyderabad, Gujarat, Bihar and all that.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Which is which is not the right thing to go for. The reason is though I have the product, I cannot deliver to them because of the logistics issue.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Okay. Okay. So those are so as I said even in the before what I need is 100 kilometers ka radius bas itni chahiye mujhko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Achha. Toh sir jaise my primary thing is primary thing is interlocking bricks chahiye tha.
Customer: Okay, interlocking bricks ka, theek hai.
Customer: That is the key thing which I should be getting.
Executive: Okay. Toh sir jaise main ek ek product ki agar main baat karta hu toh jaise sir ye Anantapur kitni door padta hai hamare yahan se?
Customer: Anantapur is around 180 kilometers.
Executive: 100 kilometers na. One inquiry 100 plus okay because 180 okay main basically isliye bol raha kyuki 6000 pieces ki aayi thi fly ash light weight brick ki thi inquiry. Koi dikkat nahi hai sir uske alawa agar main baat karu aapse.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Hindupur bhi sir door hai hamare yahan se?
Customer: Hindupur too far.
Executive: Too far, okay.
Executive: And one is Kundukur.
Customer: Even that is I'm seeing all that I'm there in the by-leads right now.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: All since it's far away man.
Executive: Okay, because the thing is Nandyal, Kodumur these are the places where it will be easy to do.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Sir basically thing is that na wahan ki leads aayengi lekin dikkat ye hai na woh unka jo
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Ratio hoga na bahut bahut ha bahut limited rahega basically kyuki ek area ka ek hi buyer dekho baar baar itni fast fast baar baar requirement post nahi karega jisko ek baar requirement hogi woh thoda din baad hi apni requirement ko kahin na kahin dalne ka koshish karega. Toh cheeze ye hai basically hai na. Toh ab sir yahi tha bilkul na toh main isiliye hi samajhna chah raha tha cheezon ko leke kyuki jaise aapka area hai Kurnool hai. Kurnool ke aas pass kaun kaun sa area hai jahan pe aap target karte jaise Gadwal hai ye bhi door hoga hamare yahan se, right?
Customer: Gadwal is close yeah it's nearby.
Executive: Gadwal is close. Okay but actually ye jo Gadwal ke buyer ne fly ash brick ki requirement post ki thi but that requirement has been posted two days ago. Okay.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Wahan se abhi hai na bilkul toh uske baad us wahan ke buyer ne bhi dala nahi hai ek Anantapur ke buyer ne dala tha teen ghante pehle lekin aapne bataya woh 180 kilometers hai. Right toh ye hai uski.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Even the price value can't be that low even if I do it for Anantapur the price should be more at least should be like 10 or 20 lakhs ka. Ye 20000 ka 25000 ka it won't work even for the logistics mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi I totally agree sir lekin sir dekho main aapko koi door hai woh nahi bataunga kyuki sir dekho jise aap areas wise baat karte ho hum focus yahi kar rahe hain ki aapke Andhra Pradesh aur Telangana ka aapke paas mostly buyer approach kar paye lekin usme ye hai jis areas ko aap limited areas ko connect kar rahe ho toh wahan ki requirement aisa hoga sir kabhi aapko dikhegi bhi regular basis pe kabhi aapko shayad na bhi dikhegi.
Customer: Simple thing Sumit what you guys can do is go to Google look for Kurnool 100 kilometers radius dal do tumko pata chalega kya kya city aayega. Bas.
Executive: Sir basically nahi nahi woh hum sir focus yahi karte hain ki IndiaMART ke portal pe koi bhi query jab bhi buyer post karta hai aur aapka jo purchase pattern generated hai jaise aap Kurnool ya uske aas pass areas se aap purchase karte ho toh woh area aapko already preferred areas ban chuka hota hai. Toh us area ki koi bhi query nearby ki aapke paas post karega buyer toh woh aapke by-leads sections mein aapko dikhegi dikhegi until and unless ki woh humne use regular basis pe check kiya ya usko paanch supplier ne connect kar liya toh that's ki woh aapke paas leads mein dikhegi else woh aapke relevant ya recent tab mein by-leads ke sections mein aapko visible hogi hi hogi sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Lekin basically sir ye hai ki is cheez mein thoda sa batana chah raha tha ki woh flow uska dekho regular basis pe nahi rahega kyuki ek limited area hai aur jo buyer hai hamara jo product hai woh aisa hai ki buyer ne aaj dali shayad phir usko 20 din baad mein requirement aa rahi hai ek mahine baad requirement aa rahi hai toh woh uske base pe rahega sir thoda thoda buyers ko leke. So it's totally dependent on the buyer's requirement ki woh kitni hisab se ya kitni frequently buyer apni requirement ko post kar raha hai IndiaMART ke portal pe. Kyuki yahan pe sir jo basically buyers hai because he is having the three modes by which he can connected to the buyer.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right, either he can approach you via calls via he can approach you via by-leads sections or third one his buyer directly view your catalog and posted the requirement on your websites or whether he directly posting your requirement related to. Toh buyer ek buyers ke paas lagbhag lagbhag do se teen options hota hai basically jiske through buyer aapko approach kar pata hai. Toh ho sakta hai kabhi aapke paas calls aapke nearby areas ki aa jaye aapko by-leads se direct query na dikhe. Kabhi ho sakta hai aapko areas ki leads dikhegi lekin direct inquiry calls ka flow kam rahega ya kabhi ho sakta hai buyer directly requirement dale kyuki buyer toh wohi limited hai. Ab uske paas options hai woh kis tarike se suppliers ko focus kar raha hai connect karne ka sir. Right na? Toh ye hai basically cheeze toh isliye maine basically call kiya ki ek baar aapse samajh pau cheezon ko leke kyuki abhi shayad aapke parso ek buyer ne directly aapko requirement dali hai sir Kurnool ke the aapki sath baat hui unse? Renu. Renu ek buyer hai 6th of November ko they have directly posted the requirement over your profile.
Customer: Maine post kiya and reply bhi kiya kuch update bhi nahi aaya tha customer se.
Executive: Woh toh sir aisa buyer hai usme toh okay sir ek baar dobara se usko connect kar lijiye kyuki woh buyer toh directly aisa hai ki profile ko search kiya hai Urban Clay ko then he has posted the requirement over your profile. Do buyer ek 5th of November ko bhi Kurnool se buyer aaya hai apna unka shayad naam unhone mention nahi kar rakha hai clearly unhone pura mention kiya tha 50 kg excels gold OPC cement. Toh unhone pura mention ji.
Customer: That's nothing that's not the right product to that's information zyada nahi hai isme.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Toh woh matlab basically sir aisa ho sakta hai buyer ne directly requirement dali toh limited dali hai baki sir aapse baat karke connect kar paye ek aap unse ek baar coordinate aap kar lijiyega jo bhi hai kyuki main woh inquiry ki baat kar raha hu by-leads ki baat nahi kar raha ye basically woh inquiry jo buyer ne directly aapki profile pe jaake dal raha hai. Right toh ye woh kya hai do hi categories hai mera mein one is fly ash bricks hai aur ek hai hollow core slabs. Magar interlocking bricks kyun nahi hai isme?
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Ha batao.
Executive: Main bata deta hu sir. Interlocking ke aapke main batata hu aapke jo products added hai ek hai ACC cements ka dala hua hai aapka. Ek aapka product Maha cements ke naam se dala hua hai. Ek aapka product fly ash brick ke naam se added hai. Dusra ek product UHPCC hollow core slabs ke naam se added hai. Ek product category aapki Ultratech cements ke naam se hai ek aapki interlocking fly ash bricks ke naam se hai. Because I'm getting unwanted things so maine pura nikal diya woh pura.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Ek second dijiyega main refresh aapki profile show kar raha hu sir bilkul aapka ab aapke paas interlocking fly ash brick fly ash brick aur UHPCC hollow core slab hai apna. Hmm. Theek hai? Ab main agar aapki iski profiles pe jata hu ek second dijiyega. Sir hamare paas interlocking bricks ki category toh hai. Magar woh kyun category mein nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Main batata hu aapko kyuki aapka jo product dala hua tha fly ash brick ka dala hua tha toh primary category woh automatically fly ash brick le raha hoga. Aap koi bhi apna ek product interlocking wall brick ke naam se daloge toh interlocking bricks aapko lega ya aap use interlocking bricks ko secondary category mein dal sakte ho. Ek products ko hum do category mein add on kar sakte hain sir. I don't know how to add that better. Ek second ek second dijiyega ek aap bhi online sir main hatho hath aapka karwa deta hu sir please be online. Main kar de raha hu sir kuch. Ye tha jaise aapka product remove kiye na toh woh shayad unke sath woh hat gaya category se ek second dijiyega main remove add kar de raha hu. Interlocking bricks. Sir teen category ho gayi hai ab aapki hollow core slab fly ash brick and interlocking bricks. Hmm. Theek hai? Ye maine teeno add karwa diye hain sir yahan pe teeno ho gayi hai ab ye. Achha. Theek hai. Haan baki jaise sir aap koi bhi apna add on products daloge toh uske related ye category automatically mapping ho jati hai jaise aap apna koi bhi product dalte ho na sir seller panel se toh wahin pe aapko dikhata hai options ki category mein aap apne keywords vagera ko kaun sa aapko lag raha hai ki is product se related kaun kaun sa keywords relevant hai uske hisab se wahan pe aap apne add kar sakte ho toh filhal maine do keywords hai aapke fly ash brick interlocking bricks and third is jo aapka hollow bricks hai. Theek hai? Theek hai. Ye products aapke dale hue hain sir theek hai na baki sir jaise maine bataya ha baki maine leads ka jaise bataya hai woh maine aage feedback bhi de diya baki jaise jaise aapko bataya ki do do din mein kabhi dikhegi kabhi ek din mein bhi dikhegi lekin apni jo bhi direct query aa rahi hai un pe apna focus kijiye sir. Theek hai? Theek hai. Theek hai baki jo aapka feedback baki jo aapka feedback aaya tha us feedback ko main close kar raha hu sir apni side se theek hai na us pe aapna satisfaction jo bhi aap apna revert kar sakte ho on the basis jo hamara conversation hua hai abhi. Theek hai sir? Okay okay sir thank you so much sir thank you have a good day sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Wants leads within 100 km radius.

- Interlocking bricks category missing.



Resolution:

- Explained about purchase pattern generation.

- Added interlocking bricks category to profile.

- Explained how to add keywords for products.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close feedback from their side.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, interlocking bricks, categories
